sense.name: a reduction in price, a deduction
sense.examples: They are selling all the merchandise in the store at discount. He manages a chain of discount stores. You'll get a 10 percent discount on the retail price if you send in that rebate. As a tailor, my uncle gets a trade discount on many of his fabrics. There were no good discounts on consumer electronics at that store.

sense.name: amount of interest charged for borrowing money
sense.examples: The Federal Reserve set a discount rate of 4.5 percent to its member banks. What is the discount on this savings bond?
